events.name: International Riesling Day
events.descriptionShort: Celebrate one of the world's most noble white grapes with refreshing acidity and versatility.

events.name: International Malbec Day
events.descriptionShort: Honor Argentina's signature red grape known for its bold, fruit-forward character.

events.name: International Sauvignon Blanc Day
events.descriptionShort: Raise a glass to this crisp, aromatic white grape with vibrant citrus and herbaceous notes.

events.name: International Rosé Day
events.descriptionShort: Celebrate summer's favorite wine - pink, refreshing, and perfect for any occasion.

events.name: International Albariño Day
events.descriptionShort: Discover Spain's coastal treasure - a crisp white grape perfect for seafood pairing.

events.name: International Chardonnay Day
events.descriptionShort: The world's most popular white grape - from buttery to mineral, oak to stainless.

events.name: International Cabernet Sauvignon Day
events.descriptionShort: The king of red grapes - bold, structured, and age-worthy with dark fruit and tannins.

events.name: International Syrah Day
events.descriptionShort: Celebrate this versatile red grape - peppery Syrah or fruity Shiraz, same noble variety.

events.name: International Grenache/Garnacha Day
events.descriptionShort: Honor this warm-climate red grape with juicy red fruit and soft, approachable tannins.

events.name: International Pinot Noir Day
events.descriptionShort: The heartbreak grape - elegant, delicate, and expressive of terroir like no other.

events.name: World Champagne Day
events.descriptionShort: Pop the cork for the world's most celebrated sparkling wine from France's Champagne region.

events.name: International Tempranillo Day
events.descriptionShort: Spain's noble red grape - the backbone of Rioja and Ribera del Duero wines.

events.name: Beaujolais Nouveau Day
events.descriptionShort: The third Thursday in November - celebrate France's youngest wine of the year!

events.name: International Merlot Day
events.descriptionShort: Soft, approachable, and versatile - Merlot deserves more love than it gets.

events.name: International Sangiovese Day
events.descriptionShort: Italy's most planted red grape - the heart of Chianti, Brunello, and more.
